data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Davis, Steven R. (2017): Coptus Wollaston (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Cossoninae): A genus new to China with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 4312 (2): 381-393, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4312.2.12|5 occurrences
